item.title: Course Policies
item.description: Activities & Assessments The following activities and assessments will help you successfully achieve the course learning objectives. By experiencing the course content in different ways, you will not only gain a better understanding of data science, but you will also get experiences that can guide you as you apply what you've learned in future academic and professional projects. Homework (20%) In homework, you will apply what you've learned during lecture and lab to complete data analysis tasks.
